allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Franklin Street Claims Management System

Features:
- Modern iOS-inspired UI with Franklin Street branding
- Client management with logo upload and state selection
- Team-based authentication with organization support
- Admin user management with invite system
- Password reset functionality
- Role-based access control \(admin, manager, user\)
- Responsive design with search and filtering
- Supabase backend integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
